spell.name: Coin Toss
entries: Whenever you see a creature within range attempting an attack or a saving throw, you can let fate decide. Toss a coin (or roll a {@dice 1d2}). On heads (or a 1) it adds +2 to the roll and on tails (or a 2) it adds -2.
A creature is not a valid target of this spell if it's already being targettend by this spell.

spell.name: Asylum(WIP)

components.m: a tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur

entries: A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into an explosion of flame. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Intelligence saving throw. A target takes {@damage 7d6} psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
The fire spreads around corners. It ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 8d6|3-9|1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Daasis' roll of madness
entries: Choose a creature within range. The creature gets imbued with psychic energy attacking it through the nervous system. The creature must succed a Wisdom saving throw or take {@damage 1d8} psychic damage. On a roll of 8, the target is also {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn. This cantrip does not affect constructs or undead.
The spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d8}), 11th level ({@dice 3d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d8}).

spell.name: Zone of Deception (WIP)
entries: You create a magical zone that guards against deception in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on a point of your choice within range. Until the spell ends, a creature that enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, a creature can't speak a deliberate lie while in the radius. You know whether each creature succeeds or fails on its saving throw.

An affected creature is aware of the spell and can thus avoid answering questions to which it would normally respond with a lie. Such creatures can be evasive in its answers as long as it remains within the boundaries of the truth.

spell.name: Boil Down
entries: You choose an area of water that you can see within range and that fits within a 5-foot cube. You manipulate it in one of the following ways:

items: You instantaneously move or otherwise change the flow of the water as you direct, up to 5 feet in any direction. This movement doesn't have enough force to cause damage.
You cause the water to form into simple shapes and animate at your direction. This change lasts for 1 hour.
You change the water's color or opacity. The water must be changed in the same way throughout. This change lasts for 1 hour.
You freeze the water, provided that there are no creatures in it. The water unfreezes in 1 hour.

entries: If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have no more than two of its non-instantaneous effects active at a time, and you can dismiss such an effect as an action.

spell.name: Frostball(Beta)

components.m: a tiny ball of snow and sulfur

entries: A fast blue light flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range and a chunk of ice grows on it. It then explodes into tiny ice shards in all directions. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes {@damage 5d8} cold damage and is knocked {@condition prone} by the ice until the start of your next turn on a failed save, or half as much damage and isnn't knocked {@condition prone} on a successful one.
The explosion freezes any water in the area.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 5d8|3-9|1d8} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Ice Shards
entries: Five frozen shards appear and float around you and you can throw them at targets within range. You can use your bonus action to throw them one at a time or your action to throw all your remaining shards at once.
Make a ranged spell attack for each shard. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d6} cold damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you create one additional shard for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Freezing Winds (Beta)

components.m: a bit of fur and a rod of amber, crystal, or glass

entries: Freezing and violent winds rise at your command and travel along a 40 feet long and 10 feet wide line from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the line must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 6d6} cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
The path covered by the winds is covered by magical snow and becomes dificult terrain for 1 minute.
If there is non-magical snow on the ground along the line, the spell deals an additional {@dice 4d6} of cold damage.
The winds lift tiny objects that are loose on its path.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 8d6|3-9|1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Blizzard

components.m: several seeds of any moonseed plant and a piece of opalescent feldspar

entries: Strong sustained magical winds blow in a 20-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point within range. Until the spell ends, ice and snow circulate violently inside the cylinder.

When a creature enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it is engulfed by the blizzard, and it must make a Constitution saving throw. It takes {@damage 3d10} cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
Creatures of size Medium or smaller make their saving throw with disadvantage. If they fail, their speed is also halved until the start of their next turn.
On each of your turns after you cast this spell, you can use an action to move the blizzard up to 15 feet in any direction.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 3d10|3-9|1d10} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Fridge
entries: Faint white light sorrunds a 15-foot cube centered on a point you choose. You divide the volume into two adjacent volumes of different size; one cold and one hot.

Choose one of the faces of the cube that are perpendicular to the ground. The hot volume is the space composed by 5-foot inwards the cube from the chosen face. The cold volume is composed by the rest of the cube.

When a creature enters the spell's cold area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it loses heat and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature starts trembling and takes {@damage 2d6} cold damage and has disadvantage on its next attack roll. It takes half as much damage and doesn't tremble on a succesful one.

Conversely, when a creature enters the spell's hot area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it starts heating and must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or it takes {@damage 2d6} fire damage with additional {@damage 1d6} per creature that has failed the saving throw inside the cold area.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 2d6|3-9|1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Cold Heart(Wip)
entries: You touch a willing creature. For the duration it can't feel any emotions. Additionally, it has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened} and disadvantage on Charisma ({@skill persuasion}) checks.

spell.name: Cool Moves (WIP)
entries: For the duration, you can your Dexterity modifier to Charisma ({@skill performance}) checks.

spell.name: Ice Barrier (Wip)

time.condition: which you take when you are the target of a ranged attack.

entries: You raise a wall of magical snow to protect you from an incoming missile.

The wall is at most 15 feet long and 15 feet tall but always 5 feet thick and has 10 AC and 15 + your spellcaster ability modifier hit points. It is vulnerable to fire damage and lasts until the start of your next turn before melting.

The wall acts as a full cover for all creatures of size Huge or smaller that are behind it. If any of the creatures behind the wall was a target of an incoming ranged attack, the attack targets the wall instead.

spell.name: Heat Transfer (WIP)

components.m: several seeds of any moonseed plant and a piece of opalescent feldspar

entries: Make a melee spell attack. On a hit the target takes blabla damage and is {@condition grappled}. At the start of its turns takes X damage. It can repeat sav throw?

When a creature enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it is engulfed in ghostly flames that cause searing pain, and it must make a Constitution saving throw. It takes {@damage 2d10} radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
A shapechanger makes its saving throw with disadvantage. If it fails, it also instantly reverts to its original form and can't assume a different form until it leaves the spell's light.
On each of your turns after you cast this spell, you can use an action to move the beam up to 60 feet in any direction.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@scaledamage 2d10|2-9|1d10} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Snowshoes
entries: Choose a number of creatures equal to 1 + your spellcasting modifier (minimum of 1) that walk with two legs within range. Their footwear or their feet get the ability to walk over snow or ice without problem. These creatures ignore dificult terrain from ice or snow.

spell.name: Sense heat (Wip)
entries: You touch a willing beast. For the duration of the spell, you can use your action to see through the beast's eyes and hear what it hears, and continue to do so until you use your action to return to your normal senses. While perceiving through the beast's senses, you gain the benefits of any special senses possessed by that creature, though you are {@condition blinded} and {@condition deafened} to your own surroundings.
